iso_neuro_ai_adversarial_tests.definition: Isomorphic patterns in adversarial tests of consciousness theories (e.g., IIT vs. GNWT) across neurobiological and AI systems capture structural equivalences in discriminant hierarchies—mappings where synchronization, broadcasting, and integration contrasts preserve relations invariantly. These include posterior vs. frontal indicators, Φ vs. workspace divergences, and test resolutions vs. undecidables, validated via 2025 COGITATE consortium studies (e.g., Nature 2025/web:0/1/6; adversarial synchronization per web:3/5) and cross-substrate analogies (e.g., bio NCC contrasts to AI layer tests per web:2/4). Hard-to-vary invariants like test persistence enable forecasts of theory gaps; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm tests/deny full resolution/both in data contrasts/neither in undecidables); scores >0.98 based on 2025 adversarial abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to adversarial test overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from COGITATE/web and theory contrasts (e.g., bio posterior sync to AI attention mechanisms).
Validate coverage; flag AI test gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., phenomenal resolutions in LLMs).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., synchronization tests); integrate diachronic depth (evolutionary NCCs to 2025 AI extensions).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

properties.universality: string (e.g., Cross-substrate: Test invariants with theory divergence)

data.description: Posterior vs. frontal synchronization as discriminants; maps with divergence in AI extensions.

examples.structure: Sustained posterior sync vs. frontal broadcasting
examples.universality: Implicational: Challenges GNWT, supports IIT partially

mappings.subatomic: Coherence contrasts (bio: quantum; AI: qubit proxies).
mappings.atomic: Vibration contrasts (bio: bonds; AI: circuit models).
mappings.cellular: Cascade sync tests (bio: ion loops; AI: node activations).
mappings.organism: Neural sync contrasts (bio: brain regions; AI: layers).
mappings.social: Group dynamic tests (bio: shared; AI: MAS sync).
mappings.technological: Loop sync contrasts (bio: wet comps; AI: transformers).
mappings.planetary: System sync tests (bio: ecosystems; AI: simulated).
mappings.cosmic: Universal sync hypotheses (bio: life; AI: multiverse).

data.description: IIT Φ vs. GNWT workspace as adversarial indicators; maps invariantly for theory evaluation.

mappings.atomic: Bond unity contrasts (bio: molecular; AI: computations).
mappings.organism: NCC unity contrasts (bio: organismal; AI: models).

data.description: Adversarial extensions to AI; maps tests invariantly while flagging undecidables.

examples.structure: Bio data extensions to AI recursion

mappings.subatomic: Proxy extension tests (bio: quantum; AI: simulations).
mappings.atomic: Model extension contrasts (bio: bonds; AI: circuits).
mappings.cellular: Signaling extension tests (bio: cascades; AI: activations).
mappings.organism: Awareness extension contrasts (bio: brain; AI: models).
mappings.technological: Recursion extension contrasts (bio: comps; AI: transformers).

completeness_issues: AI test phenomenal resolutions flagged speculative.
gaps: Theory divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 COGITATE studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm tests/deny full resolution/both in data contrasts/neither in undecidables.
